title: Ascension stuttering
body: Anyone else having a problem with Ascension stuttering as soon as you're allowed to warp into the arena? It only happens in Ascension mode and if I exit and rejoin it stops and works fine. Just curious if it is me or if more people are experiencing it.

replies.body: Something might have gone wrong with the Ascension game files if that's the only mode you ever see those stutters on. Try running a quick repair through the game client, and if that doesn't help let's have you grab our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and run a **force repatch**.
